title: 22. Staying well with herbs- chatting with my friend Jen on all things herbal medicine
description:
It was so refreshing to chat herbs with someone so knowledgeable. Natural remedies definitely aren't one size fits all. 

Jens website can be found HERE.  Shop Jen's amazing herbal teas HERE. 

1 hour herbal consult with Jen  

Herb talks with Jen (her old YouTube channel)

Books Jen recommends on herbs and natural health:

Some links are affiliate links. As an Amazon associate, I make a commission on qualifying purchases. 

Herbal Healing for Women

Herbal Recipes for Vibrant Health

Eat Right for Your Body Type

And my friend Amy Fewell wrote this amazing herb companion, which I own and love.
